title: Impulse - final speed from force time graph

content.question: What is the magnitude of the impulse exerted on the disk by the wall during the collision?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 m v times the sine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo> </mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="2 m v times the cosine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo> </mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 m v times the sine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo> </mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 1.1: Scalars and Vectors in One Dimension
